signals.problem_statement: The product does not support integration with WhatsApp for chatbot functionality.
signals.customer_ask: Integration of a WhatsApp chatbot.
signals.suggested_solution: Enable WhatsApp chatbot functionality.
signals.context: Team size not specified, focusing on WhatsApp usage for communication.

signals.problem_statement: The product lacks support for Arabic conversation in the chatbot.
signals.customer_ask: Support for Arabic conversation over WhatsApp.
signals.suggested_solution: Implement Arabic language support in the chatbot.
signals.context: Team size not specified, focusing on communication needs in Arabic.

signals.problem_statement: The product does not currently support forms and customer portal features.
signals.customer_ask: Inquiry about forms and customer portal support.
signals.suggested_solution: Add support for forms and customer portal.
signals.context: Team size not specified, looking for enhanced customer interaction features.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs automation to assign emails to different departments based on the content of the emails.
signals.customer_ask: We might need some automations plus AI to automatically transfer emails to the appropriate group.
signals.context: Operations team handling customer emails related to airline services.

signals.problem_statement: The customer lacks a feature to automatically notify team leads when SLA breaches occur.
signals.customer_ask: Do we have an option to escalate that particular email directly to the team leader?
signals.context: Operations team managing multiple email groups.

signals.problem_statement: The customer requires a feature that allows agents to see pending emails immediately after closing a ticket.
signals.customer_ask: I want the new ticket to open in my screen as soon as I resolve one.
signals.context: Operations team handling customer emails.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is looking for AI capabilities to track SLA breaches and provide real-time reporting.
signals.customer_ask: If you have any automations to track our SLA breaches and the current reports.
signals.context: Operations team managing customer emails.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a writing assistance feature to help agents with grammatical errors in emails.
signals.customer_ask: If you have that feature already with you guys, that will be very helpful for us.
signals.context: Operations team handling customer emails.

signals.problem_statement: The customer struggles to manage inbound client questions effectively due to distractions and lack of organization.
signals.customer_ask: A ticketing system for tracking response times and assigning emails to team members.
signals.suggested_solution: Implement a structured system for handling client email questions.
signals.context: Small business with about 150 clients, managing 5-10 client questions per week.

signals.problem_statement: The customer lacks a way to categorize and prioritize client emails, leading to potential delays in responses.
signals.customer_ask: A system for tagging and categorizing emails for better organization.
signals.suggested_solution: Use tags to sort and categorize incoming emails.
signals.context: Small business with about 150 clients, managing 5-10 client questions per week.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a way to track the performance of their email responses and team efficiency.
signals.customer_ask: Access to analytics and reporting on email response times and team performance.
signals.suggested_solution: Provide metrics and reports on email handling and response times.
signals.context: Small business with about 150 clients, managing 5-10 client questions per week.

signals.problem_statement: Missive has a complicated setup for managing delegated inboxes, making it difficult for users to see and manage emails assigned to colleagues.
signals.customer_ask: A simpler way to manage delegated inboxes.
signals.context: Managing customer communications for a social media agency with multiple accounts.

signals.problem_statement: The integration with Instagram in Missive is unstable, leading to disconnections that require manual checks to ensure messages are being received.
signals.customer_ask: A more stable connection for Instagram integration.
signals.context: Managing 30 Instagram accounts with high volume of conversations.

signals.problem_statement: Missive lacks social media integration, which is essential for managing communications across platforms like Instagram and TikTok.
signals.customer_ask: Integration with social media platforms, especially Instagram and TikTok.
signals.context: Social media management for clients, requiring a central inbox for all communications.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is unable to create additional shared mailboxes due to a limitation in the current plan.
signals.customer_ask: We would require like three more shared mailboxes.
signals.suggested_solution: Consider upgrading to a plan that allows for more shared mailboxes.
signals.context: Team size of approximately 30 people across multiple departments.

signals.problem_statement: The default SLA settings for the PPS team are not functioning as expected, specifically the 'due soon' status is not visible.
signals.customer_ask: The PPS team needs reminders for what has to go up, when and things of that sort.
signals.suggested_solution: The PPS team should reach out to support for assistance.
signals.context: PPS team requires timely reminders for task management.
